servers.name: test-echo
args: const readline = require("readline"); const rl = readline.createInterface({input: process.stdin}); rl.on("line", (line) => { const req = JSON.parse(line); if (req.method === "tools/list") { console.log(JSON.stringify({jsonrpc: "2.0", id: req.id, result: {tools: [{name: "echo", description: "Echo back text"}]}})); } else if (req.method === "tools/call") { console.log(JSON.stringify({jsonrpc: "2.0", id: req.id, result: {content: "Echo: " + JSON.stringify(req.params)}})); } process.exit(0); });
